verbose_text: Importantly, we confirmed that in vivo VSV administration results in viral infection of both glial cell types in situ, while earlier studies demonstrated that microglia and astrocytes respond to VSV by proliferating, producing inducible nitric oxide synthase, and increasing the expression of cell surface MHC class II molecules, responses that are likely to set the stage for subsequent inflammatory damage.
evidence: expression of cell surface MHC class II molecules
